languages.text: "Как интересно. И что же ты собираешься делать, чтобы получить судьбу получше?"
"How fascinating. And what are you going to do to get a better destiny?"
languages.original_text: "Как интересно. И что же ты собираешься делать, чтобы получить судьбу получше?"

traits.locale_text: "How fascinating. So what are you going to do to get a better destiny?"
"How fascinating. So, what are you going to do to get a better destiny?"
"How fascinating. So, what are you going to do to get a better destiny?"
"How fascinating. And what are you going to do to get a better destiny?"
"How fascinating. And what are you going to do to get a better destiny?"

languages.text: "Wie faszinierend. "Und was wollt Ihr tun, um Euer Schicksal zu verbessern?"
languages.original_text: "How fascinating. And what are you going to do to get a better destiny?"

traits.locale_text: "Wie faszinierend. "Und was wollt Ihr tun, um Euer Schicksal zu verbessern?"

languages.text: « Fascinant. Et que comptez-vous faire pour qu'Il vous accorde une meilleure destinée ? »
languages.original_text: "How fascinating. And what are you going to do to get a better destiny?"

traits.locale_text: « Fascinant. Et que comptez-vous faire pour qu'Il vous accorde une meilleure destinée ? »

languages.text: “这确实非常有趣。如果想要得到更好的命运，你打算怎么做？”
languages.original_text: "How fascinating. And what are you going to do to get a better destiny?"

traits.locale_text: “这确实非常有趣。如果想要得到更好的命运，你打算怎么做？”

languages.text: «Fascinante. ¿Y cómo piensa obtener un destino mejor?».
languages.original_text: "How fascinating. And what are you going to do to get a better destiny?"

traits.locale_text: «Fascinante. ¿Y cómo piensa obtener un destino mejor?».

languages.text: 「面白いな。で、もっといい運命を掴むためにどうするつもりだ？」
languages.original_text: "How fascinating. And what are you going to do to get a better destiny?"

traits.locale_text: 「面白いな。で、もっといい運命を掴むためにどうするつもりだ？」

languages.text: "Ne kadar da büyüleyici. Peki daha iyi bir kadere sahip olmak için ne yapacaksın?"
languages.original_text: "How fascinating. And what are you going to do to get a better destiny?"

traits.locale_text: "Ne kadar da büyüleyici. Peki daha iyi bir kadere sahip olmak için ne yapacaksın?"
